description: Physics 232, the third course in the three-semester calculus-based sequence, explores special relativity, waves and oscillations, and the quantum mechanics of light and matter. There is one 2.5 hour laboratory meeting per week. Offered annually in the fall semester. Prerequisites: PHYS 131 or permission of instructor, and concurrent registration in (or previous completion of) MATH 220.
name: Analytical III
notes: Students in Physics 232 must also register for lab 232 AL or BL.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: PHYS 131 or permission of instructor, and concurrent registration in (or previous completion of) MATH 220.
title: Analytical Physics III
